tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_yes_no_government_approval_proc CASCADE; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_yes_no_government_approval_proc AS SELECT a.amp_activity_id, CASE a.governmentapprovalprocedures WHEN true THEN 'yes'::text WHEN false THEN 'no'::text END AS value, CASE a.governmentapprovalprocedures WHEN true THEN 1 WHEN false THEN 2 END AS id FROM amp_activity_version a WHERE a.governmentapprovalprocedures IS NOT NULL;
